summary: Manage and update in-app Training Documents (e.g., replace Training Document #3 title and associated PDF upload) and coordinate around platform credit/lockout constraints.
known_issues: Platform credit/usage lockout: remaining credits may freeze after a single build until the next daily reset.
File attachment/upload reliability: user attempted to upload Training Document #3 PDF but it was not received in at least one message.

existing_features.title: Attach the user-provided Training Document #3 PDF (noted by the user as ~9,546KB) as a publicly served static asset under the frontend /assets/ path, and update Training Document #3 (id=3) to reference that PDF via its documentUrl so the UI link opens the actual PDF file.

Ensure the Training Documents UI does not require hard-coded URL overrides for Training Document #3; if a mapping is used (like the existing id=2 mapping), extend/adjust it so Training Document #3 reliably opens the newly attached PDF in a new tab.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace Training Document #3 content: set line-1 title to "Distinction Codex: Unveling the Markers of Authentic Mastery." and upload/attach the PDF as line-2 content
Update Training Document #3 (id=3) to use the new line-1 title exactly as provided: "Distinction Codex: Unveling the Markers of Authentic Mastery."

projectName: Update Training Document #3 title and attach the uploaded PDF as a static asset
